resources.string: Press on color below to apply
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Wake up device if charger is plugged/unplugged.
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Display the 4G or LTE network icon when available in the statusbar
Display VoLTE icon (Needs a SystemUI restart to take effect)
Double tap to sleep on lock screen
Double tap anywhere on the lock screen to put the device to sleep
Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Swipe three fingers to take screenshot
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Display clock in quick status bar header
Configure notification light on per-app basis
Blink LED for battery in Do Not Disturb mode
Blink LED when battery level is low
Show visualizer bars while playing music
Use a smooth lava lamp style color blend animation
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Useful if the device actually has rounded corners
A little (Coz who\'d read this anyway) info abt our team :P

Stag??? 
We are the StagOS, we aim at elegance, Material Design being at our core. 
To start up Pure AOSP was the best option cause what's more better than android straight from google. 
Next we need those teensy weensy bits of customisations, 
Like the clock could be to the right instead 
What's the download speed... and such. So why leave those feelings empty. 
With Stag we aim at giving a pure andriod experience fulfilling those small itches in the mind. 
Don't forget, You need to grow your own Horns, Just kidding enjoy. 
Sic Parvis Magna

Block all headsup notifications except calls

Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running in the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.
Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched

Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Enable with battery saver to increase power savings
Show text in expanded qs footer

OmniSwitch is currently not enabled. Please enable it in the app settings.
Only valid if 3-button navigation mode is used.
In order to add your own icon, select the top left icon and use the OnePlus 6T FP Customizer app to select the icon you want.
Icons/colors may vary depending on which device you are using.

To check time, notifications, and other info, reach for your phone
To use this feature, turn on Motion Sense
With new sensors, Pixel can recognize distance and movement around the phone
